highlights: Responsible for overall security posture, including risk management, employee training, and proactive and reactive responses to possible threats
Directed infrastructure roadmap, including performance, metrics & alerting, and stability
Collaborated with legal to build a comprehensive infosec program complying with life insurance regulations in all 50 states
Negotiated contracts and managed relationships with IT and engineering third parties
Enabled real-time metrics by reducing ETL latency from 24 hours to under 10 seconds
Designed new CI/CD workflow to speed up developer productivity and reduce deployment risk
Set up autoscaling infrastructure to handle traffic spikes of up to 20x baseline
Enabled third-party "App Store" by supporting external data stores in the data model
Directly impacted customer signing by developing several API endpoints and by improving platform performance by over 50%
Dramatically increased release and developer velocity by automating regression tests and enforcing API contracts across microservices
Mentored and onboarded new hires and interns

Implemented [Linux IMA](https://linux-ima.sourceforge.net/) in Android devices using the embedded [TrustZone secure environment](https://www.arm.com/products/processors/technologies/trustzone/) for trusted boots
Developed CNE operations tool for collection of computer-to-computer communications
Wrote utilities for lightweight heuristic-based malware detection
Created network traffic visualizations, enabling analysts to easily spot anomalies

projects.name: µCal
projects.summary: Designed and developed **[µCal](https://github.com/jchen1/uCal)**, a macOS menubar clock utility

projects.name: MiniPlay
projects.summary: Created **[MiniPlay](https://github.com/jchen1/MiniPlay)**, a popular Chrome extension adding functionality to streaming music platorms

projects.name: eva
projects.summary: Led development of **[eva](https://github.com/avbotz/eva-public)**, software for an autonomous submarine incorporating computer vision, control systems, and high-level planning

projects.name: espresso
projects.summary: Created **[espresso](https://github.com/jczhang/espresso)**, a deep learning framework designed to produce [Caffe](https://caffe.berkeleyvision.org/)-compatible maintainable yet performant code

projects.name: CLAHE
projects.summary: Wrote a high-performance iOS [night vision library](https://github.com/jchen1/CLAHE-iOS) for real-time vision pipelines

projects.name: threadpool
projects.summary: Built a **[dynamic threadpool](https://github.com/jchen1/threadpool)** in modern C++11 to fill the gap in the STL between `std::async` and `std::thread`

projects.name: chorebot
projects.summary: Built a **[Slack bot](https://github.com/jchen1/chorebot)** to track roommate chore rotation

highlights: Varsity track captain and school record holder
